dict.acceptation: （级别、地位等）较高的；资深的；年长的；<美>最高年级的；
上级；<美>毕业班学生；较年长者；地位较高的，资历较深的；

sent.orig: Strong technical force, a senior riveting workers, senior welder, senior fitter people.
sent.trans: 技术力量雄厚，有高级铆工、高级焊工、高级钳工多人。

sent.orig: Braised big dress in the wings is the senior banquet, senior dishes.
sent.trans: 红烧大裙翅是高级宴席中的高级菜肴。

sent.orig: A senior high level for Chinese and a lower senior high level for English.
sent.trans: 高中的中文水平，以及不如高中的英文水平。

sent.orig: IBM and business partners will send senior managers, senior engineers and architects to manage projects.
sent.trans: IBM及合作伙伴将派遣资深管理人员、资深工程师及项目构架师进行管理。

sent.orig: Honours were automatically awarded to senior officials just because they were senior.
sent.trans: 荣誉顺理成章地授予资深官员，就因为他们资格老。
